title: Successful user login with valid credentials
description: Verify that a user can login successfully using valid email and password credentials and that a session is maintained.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter valid email and password
Click on the login button
Verify successful login and user is redirected to the dashboard with session persistence

title: Fail login with invalid credentials
description: Ensure login fails with invalid email or password and appropriate error message is displayed without session creation.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter invalid email or wrong password
Click on the login button
Verify login failure and error message is shown, no session created

title: Dashboard renders 3-zone layout with dynamic widgets
description: Verify the dashboard layout displays three distinct zones - Now, Today and Context - with their respective dynamic widgets populated with relevant data.

steps.description: Login successfully and navigate to dashboard
Check that Zone 1 (Now) is displayed with current critical information widgets
Check that Zone 2 (Today) shows daily tasks and habits widgets
Confirm Zone 3 (Context) displays finance and academic contextual widgets
Verify all widgets have up-to-date and relevant dynamic data

title: Create, edit, and delete a habit with real-time UI updates
description: Test habit CRUD operations including creating a new habit, editing its details, and deleting it with optimistic updates and visual feedback.

steps.description: Navigate to habits management section
Create a new habit with valid name and settings
Verify the new habit appears immediately in the habit list and heatmap
Edit the created habit to change frequency or name
Confirm updated habit details reflect immediately with no reload
Delete the habit
Verify habit is removed instantly from the list and heatmap

title: Mark habit completion with streak counters and heatmap update
description: Verify marking a habit as complete updates streak counters correctly and the heatmap visualization refreshes to reflect new data.

steps.description: Open habit list and select a habit
Mark the habit as completed for the day
Streak counter increments correctly
Heatmap shows updated completion for current day

title: Task creation, editing, and deletion in Kanban board
description: Ensure tasks can be created, edited, dragged across columns, and deleted successfully in the Kanban board interface with UI updates.

steps.description: Navigate to the tasks Kanban board
Create a new task with title and description
New task appears in the ‘To Do’ column immediately
Drag and drop the task to the 'In Progress' column
Task status is updated and reflected in UI
Edit task details such as title, priority and due date
Task details update in real-time with no page refresh
Delete the task
Task is removed immediately from the board

title: AI-assisted Quick Capture creates task from natural language input
description: Validate that entering natural language into Quick Capture input parses and creates a task with appropriate fields filled.

steps.description: Open Quick Capture input in dashboard
Enter natural language task description (e.g., 'Submit report tomorrow at 5 PM')
Submit the Quick Capture input
Task is created with correct title, due date, and other extracted properties

title: Financial transaction input with AI-powered category suggestion
description: Verify adding a new financial transaction supports AI suggesting appropriate categories and allows user to accept or override them.

steps.description: Navigate to the financial management section
Open the transaction addition form
Enter transaction details such as amount, merchant, and date
AI suggests a category based on merchant or description
Accept or select a different category as needed
Submit the transaction
Transaction appears in the transaction table with correct data and category

title: Financial charts and summary update after transaction changes
description: Ensure that financial charts and summary widgets update correctly after adding, editing, or deleting transactions.

steps.description: Modify transactions by creating, editing, or deleting entries
Financial charts correctly reflect updated transaction data
Summary widgets recalculate totals and averages accurately

title: University course creation, assignment tracking, and grade calculation
description: Verify creation of courses, adding assignments, tracking their status, inputting grades and accurate overall grade calculation.

steps.description: Navigate to university academic module
Create a new course with title and semester
Add assignments with deadlines and grading weights
Update assignment completion status
Enter obtained grades for assignments
Overall course grade recalculates correctly based on inputs

title: What-If grade scenario simulator calculates predicted GPA
description: Test that the What-If simulator predicts GPA correctly by allowing user to input hypothetical grades and weights.

steps.description: Access What-If scenario simulator in university module
Input hypothetical grades and assignment weights
Simulator outputs correct predicted GPA based on inputs

title: AI Assistant responds accurately and suggests actionable insights
description: Validate AI chat interface provides accurate, relevant answers and suggests automated actions for tasks and analytics upon user queries.

steps.description: Click floating action button to open AI Assistant chat
Type a query requesting insights or task creation
AI provides correct and contextually relevant response
AI suggests actions user can confirm to automate task or data analysis

title: Create, edit and display daily journal entries with mood tracking
description: Ensure journaling functionality supports adding daily entries with mood selection, editing past entries, and correct display with timestamps.

steps.description: Navigate to the journaling section
Create a new daily journal entry with textual content and mood selection
Entry saves and appears correctly in journal list with selected mood
Edit an existing journal entry
Edited content updates and preserves original timestamps appropriately

title: Gamification points, levels and badges update upon user activities
description: Verify that points are awarded, levels progress, and badges unlock appropriately as the user performs tracked activities.

steps.description: Perform various activities like completing habits, tasks, or journaling
Points tally increases accordingly
User level progresses when thresholds are met
Badges unlock and display correctly in badge list UI

title: Focus Mode timer starts, pauses, and resets correctly
description: Test the Focus Mode timer functionality to ensure starting, pausing, and resetting works and UI reflects timer state properly.

steps.description: Navigate to Focus Mode section
Start the focus timer
Timer counts down correctly
Pause the timer
Timer pauses and retains current elapsed time
Reset the timer
Timer resets to initial value

title: Responsive UI adapts layout correctly across device breakpoints
description: Verify that the UI layout and components adjust seamlessly to mobile, tablet, and desktop screen sizes without loss of functionality or accessibility.

steps.description: Render the application in mobile viewport
Verify the dashboard and modules reflow to a mobile-optimized layout
Resize to tablet viewport
Verify responsive rules correctly display components intermediate between mobile and desktop
Expand to desktop viewport
Full 3-zone dashboard layout and sidebars appear as specified

title: Accessibility compliance with WCAG 2.1 Level AA standards
description: Check that all UI components are accessible including keyboard navigation, screen reader labels, color contrast and focus indicators.

steps.description: Navigate through the application using only the keyboard
All interactive elements are reachable and operable
UI text and controls meet color contrast requirements
Screen reader reads meaningful labels and statuses correctly
Focus indicators are present and visible on all interactive elements

title: Error handling on network failure during data operations
description: Simulate network failure during any CRUD operation and verify appropriate error handling, user notifications, and data consistency.

steps.description: Perform a create or update operation with network disconnected or simulated failure
User is notified with a clear error message
UI rolls back to previous stable state without stale or partial data

title: Session persistence across browser reloads and expiration handling
description: Verify that a logged-in session persists after page reloads and expires properly requiring re-authentication after timeout.

steps.description: Login successfully and reload the browser page
User remains logged in and dashboard loads with session data
Simulate session expiration by clearing tokens or time expiry
User is logged out or prompted to re-authenticate
